metadata.description: Originally published in the 1980s as comic books, these interrelated stories visualize life at the turn of the 21st century as a world of mutated animals, in which a lone government agent investigates the truth behind environmental degradation. Hardcover edition with new ending and more bonus material. "Intriguing." ― The Village Voice. "Zulli's wildlife art is utterly breathtaking." ― The Comics Journal. Contains adult material.
metadata.name: Puma Blues
